data.message: HAPPY BIRTHDAY MARSHALL all the best for you !!! Im a new female stan anyway lol 😂, i can believe that now you are 43 y.o, what about me ??? Im only 19 yo just like your daughter!! Im excited about that 😄, btw after i watching your old video musics, you are funniest person too , im so happy with that😚😚 i want it back !! And with your age now you still look good,cool, and handsome lol 😄😍😍. All people say its true!! Slimshady make you laugh , eminem make you think and marshallmather make you cry, im crying when i listen  music about your life, the lyrics so deep , its make me understand your pain, i can feel that pain , its so sad, im sorry😣, i hope you always in the right way💕, please always be good man and be good father, i love you so much marshall i love you slim , i love you eminem i hope in oneday i can meet you 💕💕 *its me your female stan from indonesia, once again HAPPY BIRTHDAY MARSHALL 😍😍😘😘😘😘😘😘😘

replies.message: slim said ty and he loves you 2
